predictions.text: ADP National Employment Report will show U.S. private-sector payroll change for November 2025 between +130,000 and +220,000.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via ADP Research Institute press release/PDF for November 2025; range is inclusive.
predictions.rationale: Cooling but still positive labor demand; services steady while goods stay soft.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 3.90% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using FRED series DGS10 or U.S. Treasury daily close; any close ≤3.90% qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Fed communications and dot plot expectations
predictions.rationale: Easing expectations and benign inflation data could compress term yields.

predictions.text: S&P 500 Index (SPX) will close down by at least 1.8% in a single session on or before 2025-12-20 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Using official SPX daily closes, compute close-to-close % change; any day ≤ -1.8% qualifies.
predictions.rationale: Compressed volatility leaves equities vulnerable to discrete shocks.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade at or below $75,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via major consolidated feeds (e.g., CoinDesk/Coinbase) that intraday low ≤$75,000 on any UTC day.
monitoring_signals: Perpetuals funding rates and open interest
predictions.rationale: Levered products and fragile risk appetite raise downside tail risk.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or below €35.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ICE Endex official front-month TTF settlement price; any settlement ≤€35.00/MWh qualifies.
monitoring_signals: EU gas storage levels vs. 5-year avg
predictions.rationale: High storage and intermittent mild weather can pressure TTF into year-end.

predictions.text: CISA will add at least 20 CVEs to the Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog with a Date Added between 2025-11-22 and 2025-12-10 inclusive.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count CVEs on the CISA KEV catalog with Date Added in the stated window; total ≥20 qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Major vendor emergency patches (Cisco, Atlassian, Adobe)
Threat intel feeds noting in-the-wild exploits
predictions.rationale: Pre- and post-Patch Tuesday spikes and active exploitation drive KEV additions.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-20, the U.K. government will announce at least one new Russia-related sanctions designation via an official gov.uk press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmation via an official gov.uk press release from HM Treasury (OFSI) or FCDO dated on or before 2025-12-20.
monitoring_signals: EU Council sanctions actions and communiqués
Russia escalation events and evasion findings
predictions.rationale: The UK typically synchronizes with EU/G7 timelines on Russia sanctions.

predictions.text: Federal Reserve ON RRP facility usage will fall to at or below $25.0 billion on at least one business day by 2025-12-31 (New York time).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use NY Fed published daily RRP usage; any business day print ≤$25.0B qualifies.
predictions.rationale: Higher bill supply and risk appetite continue to drain RRP balances.

predictions.text: ERCOT hourly wind generation will reach at least 38,500 MW on at least one hour by 2025-12-31 (CST).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm using ERCOT Fuel Mix hourly data (CST timestamps). Any hour with wind ≥38,500 MW qualifies.
predictions.rationale: Seasonal wind patterns and capacity growth can push new hourly peaks.

predictions.text: From 2025-11-22 close to 2025-12-31 close, Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF (RSP) adjusted-close total return will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY) by at least 1.5 percentage points.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using adjusted-close (total return) data, compute RSP minus SPY return over the period; result ≤ -1.5 pp qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Performance of mega-cap leaders vs. median stock
predictions.rationale: Year-end flows and mega-cap leadership support SPY over equal weight.
